form.name: moderate_acute_malnutrition_or_underweight
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Malnutrition> Moderate Acute Malnutrition or Underweight

field.name: Moderate Acute Malnutrition or Underweight | Take Action
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding according to the feeding recommendations
If child has feeding problems, advise mother/caregiver to return for care in 5 days
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding a sick child
If child still breastfeeds, observe mother breastfeeding and provide counseling on breast attachment and positioning, if necessary
Assess for HIV infection, if trained
Advise mother/caregiver when to return for care immediately
Advise mother/caregiver to return for follow-up care in 30 days
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
